    I am an undergraduate student in Information Security at the School of Computer Science and Technology, Tongji University. My research focuses on AI security, LLM, and graph representation learning. I previously worked with Prof. Cheng‚Äôs Financial Big Data Lab, where I took my first steps into research and contributed as a second author on a paper submitted to TKDE (a CCF-A journal), co-developing a fraud detection framework with generative graph representations.
